My Games

Splatoon 3

A team-based shooter where players use ink to claim territory and defeat opponents.

Year: 2022

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Super Mario Odyssey

A 3D Mario platformer with vast open worlds, new power-ups, and Cappy, Mario's new hat companion.

Year: 2017

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Super Mario RPG

A remake of the classic Mario RPG featuring turn-based combat and a charming story.

Year: 2023

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Super Mario Bros Wonder

A new 2D Mario platformer with wonder effects that change the world in exciting ways.

Year: 2023

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

An open-world Pokémon game set in ancient times, where players catch and battle wild Pokémon.

Publisher: Nintendo

A remake of Pokémon Pearl, updated for modern audiences with new features.

ARMS

A fighting game where players use extendable arms to battle opponents in 3D arenas.

Year: 2017

Console: Switch

A Kirby platformer where Kirby teams up with friends to defeat enemies and solve puzzles.
